name: asm_file_path_vw
scriptContent:
import os
import sys
# import create_and_send_policyxml
# import policy
path = os.path.dirname(os.path.abspath(__file__))

def return_path():
    return path
    
def get_policy_send_path():
    return_path = path + '/../../Python/bin/python2.7 ' + path + "/create_and_send_policyxml.py"
    return return_path
def get_policy_path():
    return_path = path + '/../../Python/bin/python2.7 ' + path + "/policy.py"
    return return_path
def get_policy_delete_path():
    return_path = path + '/../../Python/bin/python2.7 ' + path + "/asm_policy_deletion.py"
    return return_path

def get_asm_policy_virtual_server_deletion_path():
    return_path = path + '/../../../Python/bin/python2.7 ' + path + "/asm_policy_virtual_server_deletion.py"
    return return_path
